data.text: Nangni khat-um Laodicea ah kaom inmani ngai, halli kei kanalamumak mi rakip sik-ah angtuk kapoong karaalla chuon katho itihi nangni'n ningjet kha kei'n kamanuom.

Kei'n hiwa kathona ajarchu inmani ngai'n inmalungnga insoknasik khat-um inriangnga inchunnasik eii, tichu inmani'n katha-ah angrakip injetnasik halli inmani'n Pathian inthuuk kha injetnasik eii, khachu, Christa apumtak kha eii.2:2: Pathian inthuukna, Christa apumtak; manuscript lekkhat achu Pathian inthuukna leiilaak in Christa pa Pathian inthuukna; lekkhat ngai'n Pathian halli Pa khat-um Christa inthuukna tia injia.
Amadiang Pathian lungsing lungwar khat-um singna theina rakip ngaikha inphuumma om.
Tuteii innum inmani kha akatha in-ang innum, maleisei chongnga nangni kha lamleiitiang naroimaknasik, kei'n hiwahi nangni diang kanati.
Khachu kei'n kataksa ah nangni makheiya ka-inlaak innum, kei nangnile ratha-ah kaom, Christa diang kacheet-ah ningom halli nangni ngamna kha kamu sik ah kei'n karok.
Christa Jisu kha Pumi ejei tia ningngamnajei keengnga, amadiang inchatlekleiya omru.
Ningrajung kha ama diang mincheetru halli amadiang moongru, nangni naminchu kha angnga ngamna khan ngir mincheetru, halli kaminpaak khan sipru.
Christa dungjuiya ka-emak, miringngai sinadan dungjuiya, manmasituol waikaroon ratha ngai dungjuiya, tuteii innum nangni kha akadongkok manmasi lungsing lungwar khan suok naminchang marasu.
Ajarchu Pathian sipnakha taksa-ah Christa diang om,
halli nangni diang-um akasip ringna kha Christa diang napejei. Ama hi ranak khat-um waikaroon rakip lu kha-eii.
Amadiang miring kut-ah intan wuntan ka-emak-ah wun ningtan kha ejei. Christa in wun natan nakhan nangni'n manu taksa kha ningmathaan kha ejei.

Ajarchu baptize ningtho phakhan, nangni Christa le ningthi kha ejei, halli baptism khan akathi makheiya Christa kha kaminring nangni ngamna Pathian ranak khan nangni-um Christa le ningring kha ejei. Rom 6:4

Nangni um apha khatchu ningmanu khat-um sinadan kaommak zaatlop ning-eii jarra ratha lamma akathi kha ninglei-eii. Takkha Pathian khan nangni kha Christa le inruoiya naminring. Pathian in eini manu rakip ngaikha ngaidamjei; Eph 2:1-5
Ama'n eini manu leithona chungnga lei-injia khat-um juimak kathamak sinadan injia ngaikha ama'n cross chungnga nakhaipi wiakjei. Eph 2:15
Waikaroon ngai khat-um kathomator ngai ranak kha akasut-ah ama'n mirakip musik-ah inmani ngaikha cross chungnga minjakna apeya amatorjei.
Khantia tuteii inkhat in bak jarra emakli in jarra emakli kahoi emakli Thade kahoi emakli Sabbath nikhuo jarra nangnidiang chong tanmarasu. Rom 14:1-6
Hiwa ngaihi alakahongsik ngai raliim kha eii; takkha ka-etak khachu Christa kha eii.

Kadikmak nunchan inchuol khat-um marwaan tirton ngai chubei katho tuteii inkhat innum nangni chungnga chongtansik rahoi min-ommarasu, khawa ka-ang mi khan inmu-ngai jarra kaseiya inril, takkha iteii arei omlekleiya khawa ka-ang mi khan inmani manmasi i-ngaidon lamma in-or
halli inmani ngaikha alu ka-eii Christa khale injommujei. Christa in taksa pumpui kha ru-zaang mindon khat-um minjom, halli taksa kha Pathian imanuom dungjuiya insoon. Eph 4:16

Nangni'n Christa le hiwa manmasituol waikaroon ratha ngai diangnga inphut ningthijei keengnga, angjarra halle nangni'n hiwa manmasituol mi ning-angnga ninglaring titme? Angjarra khawa sinadan ngaikha ninglajuime,
“Mahuum khaimaru,” “Mintem khaimaru,” “Katook khaimaru”
Hiwa ngai rakip ni-inliingna-ah kamangsik eii, ajarchu hiwa rakip ngaihi manmasi chongpeii khat-um minchuna kha in-eii.
Khawa juisikdan ngaikha inlungdouwa inminsuuk chubei eii, akadikmak nunchan inchuol khat-um inpum kha intheinuo-ah karachaak lungsing lungwar eii; intaksa manuom insurna khan iteii innemna ommak.
